personalizedTransformation.title: Personalized Transformation
personalizedTransformation.description: Individual assessment of your spiritual journey with customized practices tailored to your unique path of self-discovery.

scienceBackedMethods.title: Science-Backed Methods
scienceBackedMethods.description: Proven techniques including pranayama, meditation, and spiritual psychology, validated by clinical research as effective alternatives to traditional approaches.

modernLifeIntegration.title: Modern Life Integration
modernLifeIntegration.description: Practical tools for stress management, emotional intelligence, and leadership qualities that seamlessly integrate into your professional and personal life.

premiumSwissExperience.title: Premium Swiss Experience
premiumSwissExperience.description: Exclusive setting in Switzerland's breathtaking landscape, ensuring tranquility and focus for profound spiritual work.

lifelongMentorship.title: Lifelong Mentorship
lifelongMentorship.description: Building lasting connections with authentic mentors for continuous guidance and deep transformation on your spiritual journey.

mentors.title: Meet Our Divine Mentors
mentors.subtitle: Learn from masters who have dedicated their lives to spiritual wisdom

ramBaba.name: Ram Baba
ramBaba.bio: When the body breaks down, the root is often energetic. Ram Baba offers healing that is both scientific and spiritual—Shiva Rasayana, personalized herbs, breath-based therapies. He sees where your energy is stuck… and helps it move again.

swamiPratik.name: Mahant Swami Pratik Puri
swamiPratik.bio: Swami is not teaching methods. He is showing a way of being. In presence with him, many find silence they never knew they craved. He helps you return—not to what was—but to what is real.

nagaBaba.name: Mahant Savan Bharti Naga Baba
nagaBaba.bio: For those carrying the weight of generational pain or karmic loops… Naga Baba offers soul-clearing practices that transcend logic. He reads your field, not your face. And in 50 minutes, things move.

acharyaShyam.name: Acharya Shyam Chetan
acharyaShyam.bio: Stillness is not something to be achieved. It is remembered. Acharya works with advanced practitioners to deepen their path—through subtle yogic kriyas, breath, and inner guidance.

events.title: Events
events.subtitle: SEPT 15–28  Rüti ZH, Switzerland
events.description: This September, meet India's sacred wisdom keepers in Zurich. Step into a sacred space with Vedic masters, astrologers, and energy healers.
events.returnToSoul: This is a return to something your soul never forgot.

vedicConsultations.title: 1:1 Vedic Consultations
vedicConsultations.subtitle: Not predictions. Reflections.
vedicConsultations.description: Sit with a master. Ask what you've carried in silence. Walk away with clarity that doesn't fade when the world gets loud.

energyHealing.title: 1:1 Energy Healing
energyHealing.subtitle: When the mind can't fix what the soul feels.
energyHealing.description: This is for what's stuck. What's heavy. What's unseen. Energy moves where presence is real—and our mentors bring just that.

panchabhutaRituals.title: Panchabhuta Rituals
panchabhutaRituals.subtitle: You are made of earth. And water. And flame.
panchabhutaRituals.description: This sacred ritual brings you back to the five elements. Not to escape—but to remember where you belong.

yogaBreathwork.title: 1:1 Yoga & Breathwork
yogaBreathwork.subtitle: Not taught. Transmitted.
yogaBreathwork.description: This isn't about poses. It's about presence. Stillness. Breath as prayer. Led by those who live their practice—not just teach it.

innerPeace.title: The Path to Inner Peace
innerPeace.excerpt: Discover ancient techniques for finding tranquility in modern life...

divinePurpose.title: Awakening Your Divine Purpose
divinePurpose.excerpt: Learn how to align with your soul's true calling and live authentically...

sacredPractices.title: Healing Through Sacred Practices
sacredPractices.excerpt: Explore time-tested spiritual practices for holistic healing...

addictions.title: Freeing yourself from addictions: A spiritual path

fear.title: Dealing with fear through mindfulness and clarity

counseling.title: The Role of Spiritual Counseling in Mental Health:

difference.question: What is the Divine Mentors event all about?
difference.answer: This is a rare opportunity to receive one-on-one, in-person guidance from Indian spiritual masters. It’s not a group class or lecture—it’s a private 50-minute session tailored to your inner journey, emotional healing, and energetic realignment.

experience.question: Who are the mentors?
experience.answer: Our mentors are renowned Vedic healers, astrologers, energy workers, and spiritual teachers from India—each with decades of experience in guiding seekers. They don’t just teach. They live what they offer.

readiness.question: What happens in a 1:1 session?
readiness.answer: Each session is uniquely designed based on your needs. It may include energy healing, Vedic astrology consultation, mantra practices, or breathwork. The goal is simple: to remove inner blocks and help you reconnect with your own clarity and purpose.

sessions.question: Where is the event taking place?
sessions.answer: The sessions will be held in Rüti, Zürich, Switzerland, from 15th to 28th September.

professionals.question: Is prior experience in yoga or spirituality required?
professionals.answer: Not at all. You only need curiosity and openness. The mentors meet you exactly where you are on your journey.

accommodation.question: How do I book my session?
accommodation.answer: Simply send a message via WhatsApp at +41 79 795 1817 or visit divinementors.com to view mentor availability and secure your slot.

cta.transformationDescription: Vedic consultations. Energy healing. Yogic breathwork. Sacred rituals.

about.title: What If 50 Minutes Could Change Everything?
about.description:
This isn't just another event.

This isn't some feel-good retreat where you sit cross-legged, chant a few mantras, and go back home unchanged.

This is 14 days. 4 Indian masters.
Each with decades of experience.
Each trained in ancient Vedic sciences the West barely touches.

From the hidden valleys of the Himalayas to the heart of Zurich - these teachers don't come to entertain.
They come to transform.

benefits.title: What You'll Gain
benefits.subtitle: Transform every aspect of your spiritual journey with profound, lasting change

lifePurpose.title: Crystal Clear Life Purpose
lifePurpose.description: Discover your authentic dharma and align your career, relationships, and daily choices with your soul's true calling through guided self-inquiry and meditation.

emotionalMastery.title: Emotional Mastery & Resilience
emotionalMastery.description: Learn powerful techniques to transform stress, anxiety, and overwhelm into sources of strength and wisdom using ancient emotional alchemy practices.

mentalClarity.title: Enhanced Mental Clarity & Focus
mentalClarity.description: Develop laser-sharp concentration and decision-making abilities through specialized pranayama and mindfulness techniques proven by neuroscience.

successAbundance.title: Conscious Success & Abundance
successAbundance.description: Integrate spiritual principles with practical success strategies to create wealth and achievement that align with your highest values and purpose.

leadership.title: Authentic Leadership Presence
leadership.description: Cultivate the charisma, intuition, and influence that comes from inner alignment, enabling you to lead with both power and compassion.

relationships.title: Harmonious Relationships
relationships.description: Master the art of conscious communication and emotional intelligence to create deeper, more fulfilling connections in all areas of your life.
